=== Introduction ===

Adds a new Refactoring which alters a call to a method to use named parameters in the call

=== Usage ===

 * Place the caret on a method call
 * Select "Use Named Parameters"

Your method call will change to use 'named' rather than 'positional' parameters.

For full details see [http://community.devexpress.com/blogs/markmiller/default.aspx this blog post]
